item.title: curl with Eth Json RPC
item.content: <iframe src='https://shuai.dev/embed?bg=rgba(74,144,226,0)&t=blackboard&wt=none&l=shell&ds=false&dsyoff=60px&dsblur=68px&wc=true&wa=true&pv=5px&ph=5px&ln=false&fl=1&fm=Fira+Code&fs=16px&lh=152%25&si=false&es=2x&wm=false&code=%0a%0a%23%20get%20height%0acurl%20-H%20%22Content-Type%3a%20application%2fjson%22%20https%3a%2f%2fbscrpc.com%20%5c%20%0a%20%20-d%20%27%7b%22jsonrpc%22%3a%20%222.0%22%2c%20%22method%22%3a%20%22eth_blockNumber%22%2c%20%22params%22%3a%5b%5d%2c%20%22id%22%3a1%7d%27%20-s%20%20%5c%0a%20%20%7c%20jq%20-r%20-j%20.result%20%5c%0a%20%20%7c%20xargs%20-0%20printf%20%22%25d%5cn%22%0a%0a' style='width: 100%; border:0; transform: scale(1); overflow:hidden;' onload='javascript:(function(o){o.style.height=o.contentWindow.document.body.scrollHeight+"px";}(this));' sandbox="allow-scripts allow-same-origin"> </iframe>
